message.content:
I need to identify the line item that represents the systematic allocation of the depreciable amount of an asset over its useful life. 

In accounting, this is known as "Depreciation" or "Depreciation Expense." Looking at the cash flow statement provided, I can see the following line items under Cash Flow From Operating Activities:

1. Net Profit: 1290835.16
2. Depreciation: 105893.32
3. (Increase) Decrease in Accounts Receivable: -6408987.07
...and so on.

The line item "Depreciation" with a value of 105893.32 represents the systematic allocation of the depreciable amount of assets over their useful lives. This is exactly what I'm looking for.

```json
{"solution": {'value': '105893.32'}}
```
